comment._content: AKA the Cordelia Culbertson house: cwis.usc.edu/dept/architecture/greeneandgreene/137b.html Elisabeth Severance Allen Prentiss elsewhere on Flickr (at her other house, Glenallen Estate in Cleveland Heights OH): [http://www.flickr.com/photos/clevelandmemory/3239467014/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/clevelandmemory/3238627895/]
